creator: Lance.Andersen@Sun.COM
text:
The current jstl spec indicates a JspException should be thrown  if maxRows <-1
for:

    <sql:query var="resultSet"
                 dataSource="${application.jstlDS}"
                 maxRows="-5" >
         <c:out value="${sqlProps.Select_Jstl_Tab1_By_Id_Query}" />
      </sql:query>
